Summary: 4 bright lights over the Nevada desert
divs: sighting detailsi was driving from sacramento to slc. at 12.30 am, i stopped for gas. i remember checking the time because i wanted to see if i could calculate gas cost based on time driving. so far, it was 2 1\2 hours. i got guess then continued driving. about 2 minutes into the drive, i noticed a bright orange-yellow light centered in a small hole in the clouds. i continued watching it, and it seemed to split into two, or perhaps another one joined it. anyway, it started 'jumping' up and down in the hole in the clouds, and doing little doughnuts i guess is how i would describe it. it also jumped from place to place, and the other light joined it as well. soon there were 4 lights. they did all kinds of things, such as 'crawling on the clouds', jumping from place to place, and gliding through the spaces between the clouds. one of them even did a 'loopdeloop' around another light. this is the most amazing part of this story: i talked to them as an experiment and asked them to do things such as 'going on to of the clouds' to make sure it was just my eyes playing tricks on me. also, when they disappeared, i asked them where there were, and they would immediately peek through the top of the cloud. they stayed with me for between 4 and 5 hours, leaving only when it started to get light. then they went behind some clouds and i never saw them after that. i have seen about 20 - 25 ufos in about a week. does that mean anything? it seems like they want something and i don't know what it is or how to give it to them. can anyone help?
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Elko
There were no other sightings in Elko on or around August 5th 2007
